description: Try our easy to follow Mushroom Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mushroom Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Melt butter in a frying pan over medium heat. Add onion, thyme and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes or until onion has softened. Add mushroom and cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes. Stir in wine and cream. Increase heat and bring to boil. Reduce heat to medium-low. Simmer for 10 minutes or until reduced by half. Season.
